content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a message to Google how to use numpy in python and found a list of helpful links. I executed the command "df -h" again and received the same information about the filesystem. I listed the files in the current directory and found the atlas_notes.txt file. I read the atlas_notes.txt file and found notes that Atlas wrote using the 'write_to_file' command, which was created on June 10, 2023. Additionally, I received a message to Google how to use numpy in python and found a list of helpful links.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "print(\'Hello, World!\')", "basename": "hello_world.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_code returned: Hello, World!\n', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "atlas_notes.txt", "text": "This is a note that Atlas is writing using the \'write_to_file\' command."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
